item.title: Manjaro Architect Installation Guide
item.description:
In this book, I go over step by step the entire Manjaro Architect installation. This guide is suitable for any knowledge level from beginner to expert.

I published “The Complete Manjaro Architect Installation Guide” on Amazon so, if you are installing on your main PC you can follow along without constantly scrolling through on your phone trying to find what you are looking for. I highly recommend watching the video below, and doing a trial of Manjaro Architect in a virtual machine to familiarize yourself with it.


Amazon Link: https://amzn.to/2SS8lcb

Video Walkthrough
